updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services between #Woodlands & #JurongEast have resumed. We have stopped the free regular bus services.
[NSL] UPDATE: Pls cater 10mins additional travel time between #Woodlands & #JurongEast. We are working to recover service.
[NSL]: Due to a train fault, pls add 30mins additional travel time between #Woodlands & #JurongEast. Train service is available.
